abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat St Louis Blues, 2-1; other hockey scores noted.

headline.print_headline: Lundqvist Reaches 2 Milestones as Rangers Edge Blues
headline.main: Lundqvist Reaches Two Milestones as Rangers Edge Blues

snippet: Lundqvist passed Mike Richter as the Rangers’ leader in regular-season saves and joined Martin Brodeur and Patrick Roy as the only N.H.L. goaltenders to win at least 30 games in a season 10 times.
lead_paragraph: Lundqvist passed Mike Richter as the Rangers’ leader in regular-season saves and joined Martin Brodeur and Patrick Roy as the only N.H.L. goaltenders to win at least 30 games in a season 10 times.
